content:
#  LibKey – tools facilitating the use of e-resources-- AGH UST 

URL: https://agh.edu.pl/en/students/news/detail/libkey-tools-facilitating-the-use-of-e-resources
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:22:21

LibKey – tools facilitating the use of e-resources 

 25-02-2025 

 Try the LibKey toolkit from Third Iron. For AGH University Main Library users, the services available are: LibKey.io, BrowZine, LibKey Nomad, LibKey Discovery. 

LibKey Discovery – is a tool integrated into 
AGH Libraries Catalogue
. It makes e-resources available at a click of a button.

BrowZine 
– is the world's most popular platform for browsing magazines by subject category or A-Z list of titles.

LibKey.io
 – is a site where, by entering a DOI or PMID, you can access millions of subscribed and open access articles.

LibKey Nomad – is a plug-in for web browsers. You can download the plug-in from 
Third Iron
. Select the browser you are using, install the plug-in and then select the institution: AGH University of Krakow. LibKey Nomad provides direct access to scientific articles, both subscribed by the AGH University Main Library and in open access.

You are welcome to give us feedback on these tools. Please send your questions and comments to: 
ezasoby(at)agh.edu.pl
.

Back
